name: Acacia Wood Ladder Bookshelf
description: Showcase your favorite books and decor on this stylish ladder-style bookshelf. Crafted from rich Acacia wood, its five-tier design offers ample storage while adding a modern, airy feel to your living room or study.

name: Kids' Gemelina Wood Wardrobe
description: A charming and practical wardrobe for your child's bedroom. Made from durable Gemelina wood, it features playful accents, a hanging rod, and two spacious drawers for all their clothes.

name: Rattan Wingback Armchair
description: Make a statement with this stunning Rattan wingback armchair. Its intricate weave and high back design provide both comfort and a dramatic focal point for your living room or covered lanai.

name: Modern Mahogany Sofa Table
description: A sleek and narrow sofa table, perfect for placing behind your couch or in an entryway. Crafted from dark Mahogany, it offers a stylish surface for lamps, keys, and decorative items.

name: Double-Decker Bunk Bed with Slide
description: Make bedtime fun with this exciting double-decker bunk bed! Built from strong, painted wood and featuring a safe, integrated slide, it's a dream come true for any kid's room.

name: Industrial Metal and Wood Office Desk
description: Achieve a modern, industrial look in your home office with this desk. A spacious wooden top is supported by a sturdy black metal frame, offering both style and function.

name: Wall-Mounted Bathroom Vanity Cabinet
description: Maximize floor space in your bathroom with this sleek, wall-mounted vanity cabinet. It features a clean white finish, soft-close drawers, and is perfect for modern bathrooms.

name: Velvet Upholstered Sofa Bed
description: Add a touch of luxury and functionality to your living space. This stylish sofa bed is upholstered in plush velvet and easily folds out to accommodate overnight guests.

name: High-Back Leatherette Office Chair
description: Experience executive comfort with this high-back office chair. Wrapped in premium leatherette, it offers excellent support and a professional look for any office environment.

name: Narra Wood Sideboard Cabinet
description: A stunning and functional storage solution for your dining room. This sideboard, made from solid Narra, features multiple cabinets and drawers to store your dinnerware and cutlery.

name: Round Acacia Bistro Table Set
description: Perfect for a small kitchen or balcony, this 3-piece bistro set includes a round Acacia wood table and two matching chairs. Enjoy your morning coffee in style.

name: Single-Sized Metal Bed Frame
description: A simple, strong, and affordable bed frame perfect for solo sleepers or guest rooms. The black metal construction offers a modern-industrial vibe and is easy to assemble.

name: Convertible Loveseat Sofa
description: An ideal solution for compact living spaces. This stylish loveseat offers comfortable seating for two and can easily be adjusted to a lounging or sleeping position.

name: Bamboo Entryway Shoe Rack Bench
description: Sit down comfortably while putting on your shoes. This versatile entryway piece is both a bench and a two-tier shoe rack, made from eco-friendly and durable bamboo.

name: Full-Length Mahogany Framed Mirror
description: Add depth and light to your bedroom or hallway with this stunning full-length mirror. The elegant frame is crafted from solid Mahogany, offering a touch of classic luxury.

name: Modern Low-Profile TV Table
description: This sleek, low-profile TV table is perfect for contemporary living rooms. Its minimalist design provides a sturdy platform for your screen and media devices without overwhelming the space.

name: Acacia Wood Bar Stool Chair
description: Elevate your kitchen counter or home bar with this stylish Acacia wood bar stool. The contoured seat and footrest provide comfort, while the solid wood construction ensures stability.

name: Classic Narra Rocking Chair
description: A timeless piece of Filipino heritage, this rocking chair is expertly crafted from solid Narra. Perfect for relaxing on the porch or in a cozy corner of your living room.

name: Kids' Toy Storage Cabinet with Bins
description: Teach your kids to organize their toys with this colorful and practical storage cabinet. It includes multiple removable bins, making cleanup time quick and easy.

name: Expandable Mahogany Dining Table
description: Host dinner parties with ease with this expandable Mahogany dining table. It comfortably seats six and includes a hidden leaf to extend and accommodate up to eight guests.

name: Solid Narra Wood Executive Desk
description: Command your workspace with this elegant executive desk crafted from premium solid Narra. Its expansive surface and classic design make it the centerpiece of any sophisticated home office.

name: Acacia Wood 6-Seater Dining Table
description: Gather your family around this sturdy and beautiful Acacia dining table. Its natural wood grain and robust construction promise years of shared meals and memories in your dining room.

name: Modern Rattan Weave Sala Set
description: Bring a touch of tropical elegance to your living room with our Rattan Weave Sala Set. This 3-piece set includes a sofa and two armchairs, perfect for relaxing and entertaining guests.

name: Gemelina Wood Queen Size Bed Frame
description: Create a serene and restful bedroom with our minimalist Gemelina bed frame. Its clean lines and durable construction provide a perfect foundation for a great night's sleep.

name: Mahogany Wood Bookshelf and Room Divider
description: Organize your space with elegance using this versatile Mahogany bookshelf. Its open-back design allows it to double as a stylish room divider for your living room or home office.

name: Upholstered Acacia Armchair
description: Sink into comfort with this plush upholstered armchair. Built on a solid Acacia wood frame, it's the perfect accent piece for any living room or bedroom corner.

name: Compact Gemelina Study Table
description: Ideal for students or small spaces, this compact study table offers a functional workspace without the bulk. Made from durable Gemelina wood, it fits perfectly in a kid's room or home office.

name: Narra Wood 3-Door Wardrobe
description: A timeless piece for your bedroom, this 3-door wardrobe is crafted from rich Narra wood. It offers ample storage with hanging rods and shelves to keep your clothing organized.

name: All-Weather Outdoor Sofa Set
description: Enjoy the outdoors in comfort with our all-weather sofa set. Featuring a durable aluminum frame and water-resistant cushions, it's perfect for your patio or garden.

name: Mahogany Bedside Table with Drawer
description: Keep your nighttime essentials within reach with this elegant Mahogany bedside table. A single drawer and lower shelf provide convenient storage in a classic design.

name: Acacia Wood TV Cabinet
description: A stylish and functional centerpiece for your living room. This Acacia wood TV cabinet features ample storage for your media devices and a clean, modern aesthetic.

name: Ergonomic Mesh Office Chair
description: Stay comfortable and productive during long work hours with this ergonomic mesh office chair. Features adjustable height, armrests, and lumbar support for personalized comfort.

name: Round Glass Top Coffee Table
description: A chic and minimalist addition to any living space. This coffee table features a tempered glass top and a sleek metal frame, creating a sense of openness and light.

name: Kids' Study and Play Bunk Bed
description: Maximize space in your child's room with this fun and functional bunk bed. Made from sturdy Gemelina wood, it includes a lower bunk, an upper bunk, and a built-in desk area.

name: Tall Acacia Shoe Cabinet
description: Keep your entryway tidy with this tall and slender shoe cabinet. Crafted from durable Acacia wood, it provides ample storage for your footwear collection while saving space.

name: Acacia Kitchen Island Table
description: The perfect centerpiece for your kitchen. This Acacia wood island provides extra counter space for meal prep and casual dining, complete with built-in shelving for storage.

name: Mahogany Wood Dining Chair Set of 2
description: Complement your dining table with this elegant pair of dining chairs. Made from rich Mahogany wood with a comfortable upholstered seat, they combine style and durability.

name: Sofa Bed with Storage
description: Perfect for small living rooms or guest rooms, this versatile sofa bed easily converts into a comfortable bed. It also features a hidden storage compartment for pillows and blankets.

name: Narra Console Table
description: A slim and elegant console table crafted from premium Narra wood. It's the perfect accent for your hallway or behind a sofa, providing a surface for lamps and decor.

name: Water-Resistant Patio Dining Set
description: Enjoy al fresco dining with this durable 4-seater patio set. Made with a rust-proof metal frame and all-weather seating, it's built to withstand the Philippine climate.

name: Freestanding Bathroom Storage Cabinet
description: Organize your bathroom essentials with this compact and moisture-resistant cabinet. Features multiple shelves to store towels, toiletries, and cleaning supplies neatly.

name: Wooden Folding Room Divider
description: Create instant privacy or a decorative backdrop with this 4-panel folding room divider. The classic wooden frame and woven design add a touch of traditional Filipino style.

name: Three-Seater Fabric Sofa
description: A modern and comfortable centerpiece for your living room. This three-seater sofa is upholstered in a durable, high-quality fabric and features plush cushioning for ultimate relaxation.

name: Gemelina Wood Side Table
description: A versatile and minimalist side table perfect for any room. Use it in the living room for your coffee mug or in the bedroom as a simple nightstand. Made from sustainable Gemelina wood.

name: Narra King Size Bed Frame with Headboard
description: Experience luxury with this majestic King size bed frame made from solid Narra. The grand headboard and robust frame make a powerful statement in any master bedroom.

name: L-Shaped Acacia Sofa
description: Maximize your living room seating with this spacious L-shaped sofa. The solid Acacia wood base provides excellent durability, while the plush cushions offer superior comfort for the whole family.

name: Minimalist White Study Desk
description: A clean and simple desk for a clutter-free workspace. This minimalist desk offers a wide surface for your computer and books, perfect for students and professionals alike.

name: Portable Kitchen Utility Cabinet
description: Add extra storage and counter space to your kitchen with this portable utility cabinet. It features wheels for easy movement, a durable top, and enclosed shelving.

name: Classic Mahogany Dining Table for 4
description: An intimate and elegant dining table perfect for smaller families or apartments. The rich Mahogany finish and classic turned legs add a touch of timeless sophistication.

name: Round Acacia Wood Coffee Table
description: Bring natural warmth to your living room with this solid Acacia wood coffee table. Its round shape promotes conversation and flow, while the sturdy construction ensures lasting durability.
